headline: ChargePoint Holdings (CHPT) Unveils Ultrafast Charging Architecture for Commercial Vehicles
summary: ChargePoint Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:CHPT) is one of the green energy stocks with long-term upside potential. On August 28, the company unveiled a new ultrafast charging architecture designed for passenger electric vehicles. The architecture can deliver up to 600kW of power and also provides megawatt charging capability for heavy-duty commercial applications. Powered by Eaton, the system […]
